name: Cask Protocol
highlight: Cask is a decentralized non-custodial protocol for managing recurring money flows in web3.
summary: Cask is a decentralized non-custodial protocol for managing recurring money flows in web3. The Cask mission is to onboard web2 payment agreements into non-custodial alternatives in addition to providing web3 with sustainable business models. Cask is also building ways to automatically interact with various web3/defi protocols. The Cask wallet acts as a combined checking and savings account. Funds are transferred into a yield-bearing account and then those funds are usable in automatic money flows.
